sentence.Network_en: He always dressed smartly, with pepper - and - salt suits and stiff collars.

sentence.Network_en: He had insisted on dressing himself up in a frock - coat and the most dismal pepper - and - salt trousers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他固执己见地穿着礼服大衣和那条最悔气的黑白 相间 的裤子.
